root: ^The roof of it looks kind of looks like a mansion. But what kind of mansion would have a giant sphere on it?
^Why do I suddenly hear a beeping sound?
^Is there a speaker in the grass?
^WHAT’S WRONG? A voice broke out of nowhere beneath me and you ask me what’s wrong?
^Uhh... Yeah, my bad it is. I just can’t wait to meet you, River.
^So this is, indeed, the school you talked about?

c-0: ^Name’s River. But I mean, you already know.
^Look at you, you’ve grown so much!
c-1: ^You sound like a man in his 70s, Jagger.
^I’m still in my prime and youthful 60s!
^Great. Then the 21-year-old me must be a fetus.
^Gah-hah-hah! But I indeed remember when you are 3 years old.
g-0: ^You can’t recall of course, but I met you when you were still running around in toddler shoes.
^Anyway, walk all the way up this path, I will see you at the front porch...
^Wait! How the hell did we meet when I was a toddler...
